articles.title: JWST spots planetary building blocks in a surprising galaxy - Nature.com
articles.description: Planets might be more common throughout the Universe than previously thought, suggest results from the James Webb Space Telescope.
articles.content: Scientists found the ingredients for planet formation in a star cluster called NGC 346, which lies in the Small Magellanic Cloud. Credit: NASA, ESA, CSA, O. Jones (UK ATC), G. De Marchi (ESTEC), and … [+4068 chars]

articles.author: Reyadh Rahaman, Chris Hoffman
articles.title: What Is Quordle? How to Play the Wordle Clone - How-To Geek
articles.description: Quordle is yet another Wordle clone, however, it’s one that has a bit more depth than the original Wordle. You’ll need to multitask to successfully solve this daily puzzle. Thankfully, the game is pretty easy to learn despite being hard to master.
articles.content:
Quordle challenges you to solve four words at once instead of one. You start with nine tries and can only guess one word at a time. You can play it on Merriam-Webster's Quordle website.
Quordle is y… [+3021 chars]
